Package com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.cli

Command-line tool and libraries for communicating with bitcoind using JSON-RPC

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitcoinJCli
    An attempt at cloning the bitcoin-cli tool, but using Java and bitcoinj
    CliCommand
    Base class for CLI commands that use Bitcoin RPC
    CliOptions
    Command-line options for tools that communicate with Bitcoin RPC
    GetBlockCount
    A test CLI client that simply gets the blockCount
    Status
    A command-line client that prints some basic information retrieved via RPC

Package com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.cli Description

Command-line tool and libraries for communicating with bitcoind using JSON-RPC
